pkgmetadata.longdescription: # LiberTEM-asi-tpx3A Rust+Python library for receiving sparse array streams from AmsterdamScientific Instruments CheeTah TPX3 detectors.# DevelopmentNeeds to have a Python environment active, and a recent rust toolchain installed.- `pip install maturin[patchelf] numpy`- `maturin develop -r`- `python examples/simple.py`
